name: The Pirate Bay: The Great Wave
description: Designed a new style around the Great Wave artwork which I think is kinda fitting for the Pirate Bay. It's a pretty dark theme, per usual for this type of site. Looks great at 1920x1080.
additional_info: Previews: https://i.imgur.com/7SCkStj.jpg https://i.imgur.com/k4LMUJq.jpg Optional: I would recommend converting the background image to base64 so it can be loaded locally and instantly. I'd do this myself but userstyles.org doesn't allow it. Updates 2016-08-22 - Updated and improved 2015-08-11 - .vg domain 2015-06-08 - More domains 2015-04-20 - Fixed some stuff 2014-07-31 - Updated all images to https imgur. Touched up a few things. 2014-07-28 - Added 194.71.107.164 as another domain. 2014-07-27 - Fixed some stupid margin issues. Added a few minor tweaks. 2014-03-09 - Background image will now scale to any size 2013-12-10 - Support for future .pe domain 2013-12-09 - Another domain (.ac) 2013-08-27 - Affects more domains 2013-08-26 - Release

discussions.name: Very nice looking theme, but a slight problem.
This Theme's Been Broken For Months Now
